tool_description: You can get positive news by category
name: Positive news
title: Positive news

api_list.name: Get positive news in heroes category
api_list.description: This endpoint will return positive news in heroes category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://positive-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/heroes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "positive-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://positive-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/heroes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "positive-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
